page.title: 16SPARE TIME IN NASSINGTON.
page.content: In a survey we did we found the most popular spare time activities people in the village had were the Cricket,Gym and Pony Clubs.Sailing,Swimming,Guides and Brownies all take place elsewhere at Oundle,Peterborough or Stamford. The spare-time activities and hobbies are listed in order of popularity; gardening,reading,collecting things, watching T.V.,dancing,horse riding, knitting,playing, needle-work,sewing, cricket,rugby,flower arranging,shooting music,railways,sport,wine-making,golf, sailing,fishing and football.The Newsagents said the top-ten most popular comics are,Beano Look-in,Just Seventeen,Eagle,Bunty,Dandy,Girl,Jack and Jill,Twinkle,and Blue Jeans.Comics are published by The East Midlands Allied Press,Peterborough and IPC London.Prices are 12p-35p.The comics come with the papers from W H Smith.
